author: Florence Looi
title: Myanmar cancels Thingyan celebrations amid coronavirus fears
description: Myanmar government is restricting the movement of people in Yangon and Mandalay during the Myanmarese New Year festival.
content:
Myanmar will ring in a new year next week. But celebrations will be muted because of the coronavirus pandemic.
Festivities have been cancelled and people are being urged to stay at home.
But it has not stopped some workers from trying to leave the cities an… [+62 chars]
